subdisciplines.name: Audio Engineering
subdisciplines.description: The technical and creative aspects of recording and manipulating sound.

subdisciplines.name: Music Information Retrieval
subdisciplines.description: The analysis and organization of music data, such as audio and scores, through computational techniques.

subdisciplines.name: Digital Signal Processing
subdisciplines.description: The use of mathematical algorithms to manipulate and analyze digital signals, such as sound and images.
